body.name: KITWLEMEN Camping Fan with LED Lantern, 20000mAh Rechargeable Battery Operated Outdoor Tent Fan with Light & Hanging Hook, 4 Speeds, Personal USB Desk Fan for Camping, Power Outage, Hurricane, Jobsite
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 5 hrs 46 mins
features: 【20000mAh RECHARGEABLE BATTERY】 Powered by 20000mAh rechargeable battery, it can be fully charged in 8-9 hours with 5V3A input via the including type-C cord, and provide 8-100hours duration. Built-in 5V/3A type-C input/output port and a 5V/2A USB output port for charging the fan conveniently, or use it as a power bank to power other devices, a good helper for camping trip, power outage, hurricane, etc.
【SUPER BRIGHT LED LIGHT】 Compose of 16 LED light beads with 3 brightness settings, and provides the ideal light source for nighttime outdoor activities, like barbecue, picnic, hiking, fishing, etc.

【DOUBLE TRIBLADE & 270° PIVOT】 The camping fan with double triblade design to put on more powerful airflow than the ordinary others. Plus 4 different speeds to meet your different demands. A 270° pivoting head enables to cool you down instantly in whichever direction you like.

【EASY TO USE】 The fan and LED light are controlled separately. 4 speed indicators and 4 battery indicators show you current fan speed setting and the remaining battery capacity. Press the sleep mode button to turn off the indicators when you sleep and don’t want it on. A 360° rota-table and fold-able hook at the bottom for hanging the tent fan anywhere you want to.

【STURDY & ANTI-DROP】 Made of sturdy and durable ABS material for anti-drop and anti-collision use, and the ultra-stable base keeps fan firmly in place even when working on the highest speed, perfect use for different outdoor occasions. It is also suitable for indoor use as a desk fan when studying, working, reading, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks and works great
reviews.reviewText: Item is smaller than I thought it would be, but not too small. The different lighting options are great, very bright and work well. 4 fan speeds, highest being impressive, but not overbearing. Hook on the bottom to hang the fan if needed. Large battery capacity that supposedly will keep the fan going on the lowest setting for up for 40 some hours. There are charging ports on the side, USB, and usb-c. Although when I tried to use my own Anker 100W charger to charge my phone thru the fan, my phone received a warning to "make sure the cable is plugged in correctly" thought that was odd, but I'm sure regular charging cables work fine. Just don't expect to fast charge anything on this. But what else is there to say. Portable, rechargeable, lightweight, durable, multiple functions. Bright LED light installed, with several Brightness levels. 4 different fan speeds. Large battery for fan life, and to charge electronics. Hanging hook on the bottom. Once the battery dies, it takes a long time to recharge the fan, around 8 to 12 hours, but it stays alive for a long long time. I definitely recommend. Will come in handy when camping, and I'm sure even around the house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had this fan for about 8 months now and absolutely love it. GREAT battery life, good power to the breeze for the size, the light is bright, and the usb feature works great. I’ve used this for camping, outdoor music festivals, and cruises. Definitely a great purchase for yourself and as a gift!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best camping fan I’ve ever used!
reviews.reviewText: Great features that makes this a step above the rest. The dual fan gives you a powerful stream of air. You can set the fan far away and still feel a steady air flow, even on lower settings. Battery life is excellent, at least three full nights at full blast. More if you keep it at half which is still a very decent flow of air. The hanging clip is genius, it turns so when you hang it from the top of your tent you can actually adjust it to point where you want the air flow to go. Light is nice and bright and the addition of night mode to turn off the indicator lights is pretty cool as well. Bonus as a portable battery charger as well! Very well made and will be an addition to our camping setup from now on. It’s very much worth the money!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Marriage Saving Camping Accessory
reviews.reviewText: Too hot outside? Too stuffy in the tent? Too many mosquitos swarming your spouse, partner, or yourself? Well, this makes a mosquito defeating breeze, lights up the space, and even charges your phone. We used this to shine light on the stove while blowing mosquitos away while we cooked. We hung it from the roof of our tent and it provided air circulation through a balmy night. And the battery lasts and lasts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thing is awesome!
reviews.reviewText: Great for anything you might need a fan for. Perfect for a tent. Lights up very bright. Fan settings are super nice. Battery is a beast. I bring it with me camping even in the cooler months. It has great lights , a solid USB charger and the fan is always nice to help with the campfire. Plus the actual fan pivots 180° and can hang upside down. Thing is awesome!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The fan seems to be very sturdy, the light is nice and bright, and seems lightweight enough to hang in our tent. Also, the battery life seems great! Kind’ve slow to charge, but lasts a long time. The only small issue I have is the fan doesn’t seem to blow very hard, even on the highest setting, but other than that, it’s great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding customer service by the Seller
reviews.reviewText: Initially, I was very pleased with this fan and used it in my home briefly just to check it out. However, the fan soon did not perform properly. I was past the return window provided by Amazon, so I contacted the Seller about the problem. They responded immediately and indicated they would replace the fan. Within a brief number of days, I have received a new fan which is working perfectly! It is such a pleasure to discover a Seller who stands behind their products. Given how well they have responded to me, I can unhesitatingly recommend them. And, I really like this fan. It is light weight but I cannot report yet on battery life or longevity. All my friends who have seen it agree it is a great fan. It has rechargeable batteries and lights and speed that can be lowered or increased. It has a hook that allows a way to hang it up. It has a sleep function also, allowing you to set the fan to go off after a period of time. My one suggestion for improvement is that the recharging cord needs to be a bit longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Burning Man durable
reviews.reviewText: Took it to Burning man to keep the tent cool. Battery last 4 days before needing a charge. We used it on high most of the time. It also charged our phone. Love that it’s rechargeable instead of battery powered. We were able to hang it in our tent. Fan speed is perfect for being a personal fan.

Bought for camping and it works amazing. We charged it for a few hours before leaving and were able to use the fan all night and charge our phones for three days before having to charge it again. It’s just great. Plus, the light was so useful to wash dishes at night and play games at the table outside when it’s dark
Buena potencia, se carga rápido, tiene tres velocidades, es inhalámbrico, tiene luz, se puede colgar del techo y ajustar la dirección del aire. Super recomendable.

Just to begin, I've already ordered a second because this thing is soooo good.It arrived 3/4 charged and the light has 3 very useful settings, the fan has 4 speeds, it has a "dark mode" if you're light sensitive when sleeping and a 360 degree rotating hook for your tent top.It's bright and lights up a good area. The fan is very awesome. I've always dreamed of having a fan when camping in 30+ degree weather, but this isn't a toy...this is the real deal.On the first night, I fell asleep with the fan on the lowest setting. I woke up midway through the night and shut it off. In the morning, the power was still at the 100% mark. I decided to be more liberal with it's use since a thunderstorm was rolling in and it was HOT and humid. This thing was so refreshing. At night when I had difficulty getting my fire started I suddenly realized there was no need to get dizzy blowing on the fire...boom...this bad-boy turned a few little sparks into the best fire on the lake with some not-so-great wood. I just put it near the parts that I was able to make glow and blasted it on high. Soon enough, there was a beautiful fire. I'd never imagined using it for this, but there it was, saving my fire and giving me my entertainment for the evening.After two days of regular use, it has 75% left in the battery. Like...c'mon. We're living in the future. :)

reviews.reviewTitle: Great portable power and cooling solution!
reviews.reviewText: The battery life on this is amazing. The fan ran all night and still did not consume more than 25% of the capacity. It is a great resource for charging USB connected devices and provides nice cooling and bright lighting as well. Very happy with this item.

reviews.reviewTitle: Läuft und läuft und läuft und läuft...
reviews.reviewText: Bin beeindruckt von der Effizienz des Gerätes. Der Akku hält ewig. Nutze den Ventilator indoor meist in niedrigster Stufe und würde sagen, dass er hält was er verspricht - ca 16 Std...Die Stufen sind gut gewählt von der Intensität her. Licht ist stark und praktisch. Größe gerade so perfekt, fast etwas zu klobig, aber das ist der Preis für die Akku Kapazität.Zum Campen ebenfalls bestens geeignet. Gerade an feuchteren, warmen Orten gegen Mücken.Absolute Kaufempfehlung.
